Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory227.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Shall we finish where we left off with the calibration?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Rosetta hops off the CUB and responds to Asimov on the comms.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "That won't be necessary.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Something has happened between you two, I assume.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Yes. I want to keep it this way a little longer. I think it'll be better for us if we help each other as individuals.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "That's what Combat Unit Boosters are designed for.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Combat Unit Booster...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Asimov, does it have a name?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "No. After all, it's not like other CUBs. Most of the data is unique to your centaur module.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "As I said before, you're the most suitable candidate.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Rosetta looks at the CUB, lost in thought. A moment later, she quietly utters a phrase.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Frost Oath...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Frost Oath.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The CUB standing off to the side nods slightly. Rosetta quickly realizes the meaning behind the gesture.'}
{3: "She takes a step forward, then gently places her forehead on the CUB's forehead."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Frost Oath... The snow and storm has witnessed our vows to each other.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Frost Oath, is it? I'll enter it into the file.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'What happened, Rosetta?'}
{3: "Diana's inquiry can be heard coming from the direction of the camp, interrupting the conversation between Rosetta and Asimov."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You can go. I'll have someone else collect the equipment.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Just one more thing. Temporary integration is still within the scope of our technology. You can always ask me to recalibrate it should the need arise during an operation.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I don't think Frost Oath will have any objections.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Frost Oath briefly neighs in agreeance.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: 'After saying goodbye to Asimov, Rosetta leads Frost Oath in the direction of Diana and the Forest Guard.'}
{3: 'Now that the blizzard had subsided, the sunlight shines all the more radiantly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'There was a minor hiccup, but we completed the mission successfully.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Huh? Is that...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'You guessed it. We have a new addition to the Forest Guard.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Everyone, say hello to Frost Oath.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'The marks on you two... Did you go to the mountain?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We did.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Sorry for making you all worried.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Sigh. It's not like we can do anything about it now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Let's go back to camp and get you fixed up.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before the hesitant Rosetta can finish speaking, Frost Oath walks off toward the camp.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'll leave it to you then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "Yeah, that's more like it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Diana pats Rosetta on the shoulder. Then the Forest Guard follows Frost Oath to the camp.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{3: 'While undergoing maintenance, Rosetta looks at her comrades standing before her. Even though they have been through so much, they still stand dignified. She cannot help but smile.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I didn't realize how much everyone has grown.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "You have, too. The old Rosetta wouldn't be so willing to accept help from others.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm sorry.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "It's okay. We've been working hard to help shoulder your burden.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "You've known all this time?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'You wear your heart on your sleeve, Rosetta.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'Members of the Forest Guard might not be strong individually, but as long as we come together, nothing can stand in our way.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: 'This is how we survive.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Diana', 3: "It's not one person's responsibility to protect everyone. We work together and share this duty.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "...You're right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'I did go overboard in the past.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But now, I hope you will all help me shape the future of the Forest Guard.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: "Hehe, even Frost Oath knows what's up.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forest Guards', 3: "You don't have to ask. We'll gladly stand by your side.", 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'Having finished repairs, the Forest Guard follows Frost Oath and gathers with Rosetta in the center.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Diana', 3: 'Welcome back.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Glad to be back.', 4: '1'}
